titles.title: A bill to suspend for a three-year period the duty on (1)3-quinolinecarboxylic acid, 1-ethyl-6-fluoro-1, 4-dihydro-4-oxo-7-(1-piperazinyl)-, also known as norfloxacin.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 9/16/1988--Introduced. Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to suspend, for a three-year period, the duty on (1) 3-Quinolinecarboxylic acid, 1-ethyl-6-fluoro-1, 4-dihydro-4-oxo-7-(1-piperazinyl), also known as Norfloxacin.
